m:template.name: content

div.label: Userrole to associate to a newly created user

div.data-mendix-props: "widgetTree":[{"widget":"com.mendix.widget.core.Text","widgetId":"9_34_54","props":{"name":"text12","class":"mx-name-text12","style":{"display":"inline-block","fontSize":"70%","fontStyle":"italic"},"caption":{"$type":"DynamicTextProperty","template":{"elements":["Checking the box will execute microflow 'CustomUserProvisioning'. In this microflow you can do additional validation before login or intelligently copy and alter assertion claims before storing them in the user. "],"friendlyId":"SAML20.UserProvisioning_Mapping.text12"}},"renderMode":"span"}}]

"widgetTree":[{"widget":"com.mendix.widget.core.Text","widgetId":"9_34_61","props":{"name":"text14","class":"mx-name-text14","style":{"display":"inline-block","fontSize":"70%","fontStyle":"italic"},"caption":{"$type":"DynamicTextProperty","template":{"elements":["Checking the box will execute microflow 'CustomAfterSigninLogic'. This microflow is executed after the new session has been created, and you can copy or review data from the original (anonymous) session to the newly created session or user. This functionality is similar to the after sign-in microflow you can find in the Mendix project security."],"friendlyId":"SAML20.UserProvisioning_Mapping.text14"}},"renderMode":"span"}}]

"widgetTree":[{"widget":"com.mendix.widget.core.Text","widgetId":"9_34_68","props":{"name":"text16","class":"mx-name-text16","style":{"display":"inline-block","fontSize":"70%","fontStyle":"italic"},"caption":{"$type":"DynamicTextProperty","template":{"elements":["This will allow you to use a SAML token and delegate the authentication through SAML. By checking this box you are able to access the authorized SAML token, the module will automatically keep the token alive.\r\nOnly check this box if you are actually using delegated authentication."],"friendlyId":"SAML20.UserProvisioning_Mapping.text16"}},"renderMode":"span"}}]

"widgetTree":[{"widget":"com.mendix.widget.core.Text","widgetId":"9_34_75","props":{"name":"text18","class":"mx-name-text18","style":{"display":"inline-block","fontSize":"70%","fontStyle":"italic"},"caption":{"$type":"DynamicTextProperty","template":{"elements":["If enabled, an auth token cookie will be set on login that can be used by Mendix hybrid mobile apps to log in after the app is closed. Only check this if you are actually using SAML on a hybrid mobile app. Note that this functionality alos requires changes to the hybrid app package."],"friendlyId":"SAML20.UserProvisioning_Mapping.text18"}},"renderMode":"span"}}]

m:template.label: Specify which Mendix object attributes have to be overwritten by IdP assertion data.

div.data-mendix-props: "widgetTree":[{"widget":"com.mendix.widget.core.Text","widgetId":"9_94_114","props":{"name":"text17","class":"mx-name-text17","style":{"display":"inline-block","fontSize":"70%","fontStyle":"italic","marginTop":"20px"},"caption":{"$type":"DynamicTextProperty","template":{"elements":["Authentication should start at this applciation, which generates an ID. The authenticated response should match this generated Id. If no request can be found that matches the response Id the information is rejected. \r\nIf your IdP can initiate a new transaction (with a new or no Id) and you want to allow this you can check this box. \r\nPlease avoid this option since this is considered less secure."],"friendlyId":"SAML20.AuthenticationConfig.text17"}},"renderMode":"span"}}]

"widgetTree":[{"widget":"com.mendix.widget.core.Text","widgetId":"9_94_136","props":{"name":"text16","class":"mx-name-text16","style":{"display":"inline-block","fontSize":"70%","fontStyle":"italic","marginTop":"20px"},"caption":{"$type":"DynamicTextProperty","template":{"elements":["Specify which authentication methods you and your IdP are allowing. Your IdP will support only a subset of Authentication context, you could choose to support all or only a few of the options.\r\nMost common options are Secure Remote Password and Integrated Windows Authentication (or nothing for the InCommon standard)"],"friendlyId":"SAML20.AuthenticationConfig.text16"}},"renderMode":"span"}}]

m:template.name: content
m:template.label: The following metadata has been fetched.

div.data-mendix-props: "widgetTree":[{"widget":"com.mendix.widget.core.Label","widgetId":"9_28_179","props":{"name":"","class":"control-label","caption":{"$type":"DynamicTextProperty","template":{"elements":["The entity where the user is to be found"],"friendlyId":"SAML20.UserProvisioning_AppAttributes."}}}}]

"widgetTree":[{"widget":"com.mendix.widget.core.Label","widgetId":"9_28_181","props":{"name":"","class":"control-label","caption":{"$type":"DynamicTextProperty","template":{"elements":["The attribute where the user principal is stored"],"friendlyId":"SAML20.UserProvisioning_AppAttributes."}}}}]

"widgetTree":[{"widget":"com.mendix.widget.core.Text","widgetId":"9_12_13","props":{"name":"label1","class":"mx-name-label1","style":{},"caption":{"$type":"DynamicTextProperty","template":{"elements":["Select an attribute, provided by the IdP, which contains the value which uniquely identifies a user (also known as user principal). "],"friendlyId":"SAML20.UserProvisioning_IdPAttributes.label1"}},"renderMode":"h4"}}]

div.label: Select attribute of which the value should be used while executing a user look-up. If custom, use the formal name (URN) of the attribute.
Not applicable
